org.matrix.androidsdk.util

Class BingRulesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.util.BingRulesManager

  • public class BingRulesManager
extends Object
    Object that gets and processes bing rules from the server.

        Returns:

      • muteRoomNotifications

        public void muteRoomNotifications(String roomId,
                                  boolean isMuted,
                                  BingRulesManager.onBingRuleUpdateListener listener)
        Mute / unmute the room notifications. Only the room rules are checked.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room id to mute / unmute.
        isMuted - set to true to mute the notification
        listener - the listener.
